job_description:
• Education should include either a B.
• Strong skills in: modeling, software development, debugging, and problem-solving, and writing reports and/or user guides/manuals Experience working with process models, time-series data, images, and Manufacturing data Experience in the areas: Engineering/Sciences modeling and AI techniques Familiarity with semiconductor processes or integration is encouraged Ability to work with sparse data sets and ill-defined problems.
